author: Wayne LeRoy
comment: I wish the add-on widgets for this app were more configurable. Not a single one of them allows me to choose all of the units. I can control the main ones only. So I uninstalled the widgets because none of them were acceptable. I did keep Amber weather as it is nice. Just wish your widgets were better.

Update=3.6.7 BAD BAD BAD LOCATION ACCURACY. I CHECKED MY RECORDS ABOUT MY FIRST CORRESPONDENT TO YOU TO IMPROVE THE LOCATION ACCURACY. IT WAS 18 MONTHS AGO. AND, YOU DID NOTHING. WHAT SHOULD I SAY ABOUT YOUR CUSTOMER SERVICE?????

reply.author: Amber Mobile Limited
reply.content: Is there any improvements in location accuracy? We'd like to know how you are using our new version.

author: Kevin Pedley
comment: i liked it because some of the widgets were simple and nice. but the widgets changed on their own more than once, and the notifications are getting annoying. i may look for another clock widget if more pop ups appear

author: badgerquest
comment: Couple years later and it's still occasionally asking me to rate and give feedback. I will open it for /the weather/ and almost always have to dismiss some notification or another. I don't even use the widgets anymore.

author: Stacey Jones
comment: Update,  have had this app for almost a year and even though a paid app its plagued with ads !!! , and hidden push ads which I hate!!  Will be uninstalling and not renewing,  good riddens!!

author: Gelynn ‪
comment: Almost as good as Accuweather, but doesn't force me to keep my gps on. My only critique for Amber weather is to have a native English speaker go through & proof read the grammar. Some of it sounds like they tried hard to get it correct. *Currently widgets have a separate notification setting than the main app. I think it's conflicting. I keep getting morning and evening alerts when I turned them off.

reply.author: Amber Mobile Limited
reply.content:
We value your feedback

Best Wishes,
Team Amber Weather

author: Heinz Elmann
comment: This app acts like an annoying advertisment bot. Consequentially I cancelled the subscription a while ago. Do not install or subscribe!

Initially rated 5 stars. After rating, I was asked to... rate it... again? Edited to 4 stars. A few weeks of consistent notifications in-app to rate later, I got enough spare time to take another star off. Great app, though!

author: Himanshu P
comment: Although the weather shown is correct there is still inaccuracy in the weather timing and it's intensity predictions. Willing to give full rating provided improvements are observed.

author: Patty Holmes
comment: Bad thing is the location is really wrong, often. It would be great, other than that.

reply.author: Amber Mobile Limited
reply.content: Dear user, apologies for the bad experience. You can check network and GPS are working properly. If not, please make sure that they are woking. And you should enable location service in your phone. We hope the reply can be helpful to you, and really appreciate your feedback.

author: William messenger
comment: Keeps asking for more and more reviews. Very annoying

author: Bradley Rentfrow
comment: The constant pleas to review the app is downright annoying. Would give it 5 stars but had to take off 3 just because of the annoying pleas. With the next interruption to review this app I'll just uninstall even if I have paid for it.

reply.author: Amber Mobile Limited
reply.content: Have you subscribed our app? All our subscribers cannot see any of our ads.

author: Patti Kelly
comment: So, they asked for an update, no problem. I have used it a few months, workes well & I really like it. Has a little pop-up when I sign on, gives needed info, a page to go to also. My fav is the clock widget, the transparent one, which stays on my homescreen. Thanks for the good app! Have had it for a few days now they asked me to come review it. I am happy with it. Works like it says it does, causes no problems so far. Thanks, nice app!

reply.author: Amber Mobile Limited
reply.content: My dear user, thank you for your appreciation! You can download more cool locker themes in our locker store. And could you recommend it to your friends and family? Thanks again and please enjoy using our app.

author: Suzy Lynn Royer-Buchanon
comment: It's TOTALLY AwSuM ~~~ It also has the BEST widget's ever!!!!😎😁💧🔥☔🌂⛄🌈❄🌬🌊⚡🌀🌞🌫⛈🌩🌓🌔🌗🌡🌠🌒Keep up the good work!!!!!!

reply.author: Amber Mobile Limited
reply.content: Thank you! If you like us, please follow our facebook as well~ https://www.facebook.com/amberweatherapp

author: John Elias Brazil How
comment: I like to have my weather in my notifications and this does a good job for that. The notification is expenditure for a 7 day report. I'd appreciate if it stops asking me to rate the app when I've already rated it .

author: Masoud Ghazizadeh
comment: Everything fine, except I didn't manage to disable the daily pop-up notification. Edit: Clear app data and run it again. It asks if you want a daily notification. Uncheck it and that's it. BTW, I get two different AQIs in the main window. Looking for a fix for this is...

author: matt schmalz
comment: to may adds and no way to kill them even when you purchase the add remover...just plain sucks now

author: Ben Grego
comment: Sent you an email but it would not go through I like your site very much but please tell me how to get rid of that awful bright blue background on a title page it is very annoying other than that great job!!!

author: Mr.Dheeraj Sharma
comment: A nice application with good features. The user interface is very simple and gives a lot of information about current weather and future predictions. The notification regarding next day's weather, for instance it is going to be extremely hot or it will shower heavily, looks interesting.

author: Google Account
comment: Will tell you hour by hour what it predicts the weather and temp will be, air quality, dew point, wind speeds and direction, humidity, pressure, uv, aqi, lunar phase, sunrise sun set times, 24 hr,  15 day, and months of the year predicted temps. Will alert you of bad weather and tell you of it is a good day for outdoor sports.

author: Carol Niklewski
comment: Still Loving this app! I am not very technical, so not sure how to explain, but I have tried many weather apps and this one is the best, in my opinion! The widgets are awesome and I love the way all the information is presented!

author: Gamith Imanka
comment: Great app. Nice UI. Keep it upgraded over time. This will be the beast weather app

author: Thomas Yount
comment: Yes need this so know Wat type weather is coming towards me and rest of day or weekend thank you very much love this App. I Give You 5   Stars Thank you

author: shawn thomas
comment: I have had this only a couple of days and so far so good gives good weather reports so far the thing I like the best it  follows me and let's me know what the weather is where I am at keep up the good work

author: sushil mayhem
comment: Can I just ask after doing a brilliant job on weather and climate details and after the user has rated it, why does the app persistently ask for rating? Do you really want the user to rate is everyday?

author: Luca Gentile
comment: One of the most useful wear forecast with a practical 1x1 widget.   "Climate overview" feature, it shows you the historical average temperature and precipitation by month.   The only missing is the hourly forecast

reply.author: Amber Mobile Limited
reply.content: My dear user, thank you for your appreciation! You can download more cool locker themes in our locker store. And could you recommend it to your friends and family? Thanks again and please enjoy using our app.

author: Rudy Limjoco
comment: very usefull, 80 - 90 % accurate make us aware & be prepared. a must have apps to everybody.

reply.author: Amber Mobile Limited
reply.content: Thank you! We are very happy it helps !

author: Brad Bennett
comment: This app has terrible ads that hide in the background of your phone.

author: Eddie Masuch
comment: I love this app,I'VE been using this app for around 15 or more years now I spread the word around about this app often.Keep up the great work all of you thanks very much.

reply.author: Amber Mobile Limited
reply.content: My dear user, thank you for your appreciation! You can download more cool locker themes in our locker store. And could you recommend it to your friends and family? Thanks again and please enjoy using our app.

author: Brent Cheney
comment: Only complaint is I'd like some more widgets instead of just having to download third party ones that don't pair with amber weather, other than that it's probably the best and most customizable weather app I've come across.

reply.author: Amber Mobile Limited
reply.content: My dear user, thank you for your 4 star! You can download more cool locker themes in our locker store. And could you recommend it to your friends and family? Thanks again and please enjoy using our app.

author: Usman Shehzad
comment: If you are moving from one place to another it will show wrong forecast

author: Phil S
comment: Not updates but dying widget... there wasnt an issue with earlier versions

reply.author: Amber Mobile Limited
reply.content: Could you explain the issue in detail?

author: Kyle Griffith
comment: It shows me th e temperature.  Pretty wild.

author: Persea Malaveci
comment: It's cool because you now how weather is every time of  the day you want and is easy to use it.I love this super duper cool ap.😎😎😝😝😁😁🔍🔍😊😊

author: Thomas Pendleton
comment: 4 stars because of widgets not working/ compatibility

reply.author: Amber Mobile Limited
reply.content: Dear user, sorry for the inconvenience. Please try to check if you already opened phone GPS service and make sure network is connected. Weather information will be updated soon. Thanks for your feedback.

author: Rebecca Fouts
comment: Clock has not updated since applying the widget

reply.author: Amber Mobile Limited
reply.content: Thank you! Have you tried our stylish widgets listing in Customize? Do you have any suggestions for us to enrich our widget style?

comment: Hourly forecast is not very accurate

author: Peter Murray
comment: An excellent app. Does what it says on the tin. Please stop asking for ratings and reviews all the time. That will eventually make me delete it.

author: tanveer shah
comment: This app ne humko bataya hai ki 11-12-2017 korain faal hoga if yes then i like it if no then i uninststall it
